name: Whack a Hole To Whack a Mole
name_original: Whack a Hole To Whack a Mole
description:
this is actually my first gamejam (or shall i say first published game) and to be honest i had a lot of fun making this game .. the gameplay is that you have to hit the moles(or whatever i was that thing that i made) as fast as possible .. but you have to open the hole before the mole can get out if you fail to open the hole 3 times you will lose

also the faster you hit the more score that you will get 

Controls : 

-Right Click To Open THe Hole

-Left Click To hit With The Hammer

Tools used :

-Aseprite 0.9.5(free version)

-Unity 2019.3

-gfxr

you can see from how badly my game looks that i am a beginner but i am sure you can enjoy the game for more the 5 mins .. i wanted to make more things but i didn't have enough time. enough said , try the game now.
